mdRecord.dcterms:title: "A Contribution by Lord Avebury" and etc; 04 of 05
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 33-74, cloth sleeve"The Truth About Darwinism"; Reoccurring section of a periodical for BENA (British Empire Naturalist Association), where an ongoing discussion of multiple aspects of Darwinism is addressed by experts who write-in, along with editor comments. Select pages pulled for Faulds's notes. Included articles in this batch: "A Contribution by Lord Avebury" by Lord Avebury, "The Cause of Variation" by E. K. R. commenting on Roper, and "Adaptation to Circumstances" by H. Jeffreys.; E. Kay Robinson (E. K. R.), ed., London, p. 299-303, Country-Side; 5 pages; DF n.a.
